name: DataUtilTest
description: Unit tests for DataUtil class, focusing on charset handling, BOM detection, and file parsing.

methods.name: stream
methods.signature: private ControllableInputStream stream(String data, String charset)

test_cases.name: testCharset
test_cases.description: Tests the extraction of charset from content type strings.

test_cases.name: testQuotedCharset
test_cases.description: Tests the extraction of charset from content type strings with quoted charset values.

test_cases.name: discardsSpuriousByteOrderMark
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of BOM in HTML content.

test_cases.name: discardsSpuriousByteOrderMarkWhenNoCharsetSet
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of BOM in HTML content when no charset is set.

test_cases.name: shouldNotThrowExceptionOnEmptyCharset
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior when the charset is empty in the content type string.

test_cases.name: shouldSelectFirstCharsetOnWeirdMultileCharsetsInMetaTags
test_cases.description: Tests the selection of the first charset when multiple charsets are specified in meta tags.

test_cases.name: shouldCorrectCharsetForDuplicateCharsetString
test_cases.description: Tests the correction of charset when the charset string is duplicated.

test_cases.name: shouldReturnNullForIllegalCharsetNames
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of illegal charset names in the content type string.

test_cases.name: generatesMimeBoundaries
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of MIME boundaries.

test_cases.name: wrongMetaCharsetFallback
test_cases.description: Tests the fallback behavior when the meta charset is incorrect.

test_cases.name: secondMetaElementWithContentTypeContainsCharsetParameter
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of the second meta element with a charset parameter.

test_cases.name: firstMetaElementWithCharsetShouldBeUsedForDecoding
test_cases.description: Tests that the first meta element with a charset should be used for decoding.

test_cases.name: parseSequenceInputStream
test_cases.description: Tests parsing a sequence input stream.

test_cases.name: supportsBOMinFiles
test_cases.description: Tests support for BOM in various encoding files.

test_cases.name: streamerSupportsBOMinFiles
test_cases.description: Tests support for BOM in various encoding files using stream parser.

test_cases.name: supportsUTF8BOM
test_cases.description: Tests support for UTF-8 BOM.

test_cases.name: noExtraNULLBytes
test_cases.description: Tests that no extra NULL bytes are present in the parsed document.

test_cases.name: supportsZippedUTF8BOM
test_cases.description: Tests support for UTF-8 BOM in zipped files.

test_cases.name: streamerSupportsZippedUTF8BOM
test_cases.description: Tests support for UTF-8 BOM in zipped files using stream parser.

test_cases.name: supportsXmlCharsetDeclaration
test_cases.description: Tests support for XML charset declaration.

test_cases.name: loadsGzipFile
test_cases.description: Tests loading and parsing a gzip file.

test_cases.name: loadsGzipPath
test_cases.description: Tests loading and parsing a gzip file using Path.

test_cases.name: loadsZGzipFile
test_cases.description: Tests loading and parsing a gzip file with .z suffix.

test_cases.name: loadsZGzipPath
test_cases.description: Tests loading and parsing a gzip file with .z suffix using Path.

test_cases.name: handlesFakeGzipFile
test_cases.description: Tests handling of a file that is not actually gzipped.

test_cases.name: handlesFakeGzipPath
test_cases.description: Tests handling of a file that is not actually gzipped using Path.

test_cases.name: handlesChunkedInputStream
test_cases.description: Tests handling of a chunked input stream.

test_cases.name: handlesUnlimitedRead
test_cases.description: Tests reading an unlimited amount of data from an input stream.
